info.title: RocketReach Email - Social Links - Lookup
info.description:
The RocketReach API allows you to find contact information for anyone (email lookup, phone, links on social sites like linkedin, twitter, facebook, github etc.) using a simple, yet powerful API. We are working on an ever expanding list of powerful APIs, that can be used for lead discovery automation, prospecting, email campaigns etc.

See more at http://rocketreach.co/api

get.description: See detailed documentation at http://rocketreach.co/api Allows you to lookup email, social links, summary, geography for any professional person.

parameters.name: current_employer
parameters.description: Current Employer e.g. Google, Facebook, Self-Employed.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the person you are looking for
